body:
Hi guys, 

as you may have noticed i havent been on avicus for like a month.

So i decided to write a few lines to let you all know im still breathing and doin the other things that help you live,

long story short, dead graphics card, cant afford a new one, when i join avicus minecraft goes spastic. I somehow can play dota if i turn the graphics to UNBEARABLE so yeah, i play a lot of dota.

Sometimes i can join other servers, but sometimes i can't because..... LOGIC!?

so yeah, i'm still alive and chuggin,

Nathan

title: Its OK im not dead...
